thread.section_title: Nelson Alexander Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nelson Alexander | www.nelsonalexander.com.au
thread.title: Ranee

author: Ranee
title: Ranee
text:
I approached Frank at Nelson Alexander because I wasn’t satisfied with the service I was receiving from the previous agent.
Frank helped me throughout the whole changeover period. He contacted the previous agent so I didn’t have too, gathered all the relevant documents and information needed and had everything sorted within a week.
One thing that stood out to me was how frequently Frank followed up, not only throughout the take-over process but also with general inspections, rental payments, tenant needs etc. I never have to worry when things will be done as Frank is always proactive with keeping me informed. He is very patient, even when I ask him a multitude of questions and delivers on client expectations.
I found the change over experience an easy simple and seamless one and would highly recommend Frank to people who need a Rental Property Manager!
